dcterms:creator: D. Nelson
et al.
dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of simulated galaxies created from the IllustrisTNG simulations, used for training learned reconstruction networks in radio interferometric imaging.
dcterms:title: IllustrisTNG simulations

dcterms:description: A dataset representing the uv-coverage from the MeerKAT telescope, used for evaluating the performance of reconstruction methods on realistic radio observations.
dcterms:title: MeerKAT uv-coverage

dcterms:description: Simulated measurements derived from actual radio observations, used to assess the effectiveness of learned reconstruction techniques.
dcterms:title: Simulated measurements from an actual radio observation

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of random uv-coverages used for training and evaluating reconstruction methods in radio interferometry.
dcterms:title: Random uv-coverages

dcterms:description: A dataset representing a Gaussian distribution of uv-coverages used for training learned reconstruction methods.
dcterms:title: Gaussian distribution of uv-coverages
